title: Justicar Syndra Backport Bug [Gameplay]

replies.body:
Yo Taronus! Thanks for bringing this up here. Did some digging and it looks like this bug was reported but got lost in the sea. Going ask the team to take a look at this ASAP. <3

UPDATE: Just wanted to let you know we're actively working on a fix for this.

Hey hey 
That's sound really nice
Im  happy to hear that the team is going to fix this bug :)  because it has been there for a looooong time ^^
Thank you very much for your attention and for the Labor :)
